alert.note: Alert for East Becker; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Becker County through 600 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Callaway, or 12 miles northwest of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Frazee, Toad Lake, Height Of Land Lake, Callaway, Shoreham and Richwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
